name: Flying School Dolna Banya
about: Flying School Dolna Banya, located at Borovets St., Dolna Banya, 2040, Bulgaria, is a premier aviation training center dedicated to the comprehensive education of both professional and amateur pilots. Our main activity focuses on the training of pilots for very light and light aircraft, guiding students from the initial stages to full licensing. Operating out of Dolna Banya Airport, we utilize the facilities of the FTO "Rattan" to provide a robust and structured learning environment. Our programs are designed to ensure that all students receive the highest quality instruction, equipping them with the skills and knowledge necessary to excel in their aviation careers. With a commitment to safety, excellence, and personalized training, Flying School Dolna Banya is the ideal choice for aspiring pilots in Bulgaria.
services:
["Professional pilot course
PPL(A)
Night Rating - for VFR night flights
CPL(A)
IR(A)/PBN(SE)
MEP-L
IR(A)/PBN(ME)
Aircraft charter
Aircraft storage
Technical service
Aircraft airworthiness maintenance
Airport rental"]
